note.p: Daughter of Thomas and Lucy Wharton of Ashbourne, Derbyshire. Companion to Mary Parker (1774–1859); living with her in Ashbourne in 1841 and 1851. Living with her sisters, Mrs Lucy Ann Vaudrey and Frances Wharton, at Hulland, Derbyshire, in 1861.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/197/1/15/24), 1851 (HO107/2146/305/45), 1861 (RG9/2521/86/2)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 6 March 2017)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 6 March 2017)
